title: Decent Scrub Streamer

embed.description: OCE] Platypus Pro League is now Diamond Dogs

body:
Oh hey there. 

You doing nothing on a fine weekday such as this?  Why not come by and spend some time with me?

I'm in Diamond 5 and I'm aight at the game I guess. Then again peeps don't watch my stream for gameplay. It's to have a chuckle. And maybe take this extra Academy Ahri I have off my hands.

EDIT: offline
